$schema: Design system for Sprintwise - AI-replicable guidelines

highLevel: Warmth & Approachability — Use a warm, inviting palette and soft rounded forms to make users feel welcomed
Clarity & Simplicity — Minimalist approach with ample whitespace, clear visual hierarchy, intuitive layouts
Consistency — Uniform styling for interactive elements, typography, and container shapes across all screens
Focus on Content — Design elements support readability and interaction without distraction
Subtle Depth — Very soft shadows or gradient-like shifts; avoid strong skeuomorphism
Smart Simplicity — Intelligent use of space and color; every element serves a purpose; calm and efficient
designPrinciples.style: Modern, friendly flat design with subtle depth. Warm pastel accents on a cream canvas. Rounded corners dominate. Professional yet approachable.

background.description: Primary page background — soft cream, warm off-white

text.description: Primary for headings/strong text; secondary for body/labels; tertiary for hints/inactive

accents.primaryDescription: Hero accent — primary CTAs, active states, links, key interactive elements
accents.peachDescription: Warm accent — headers, prominent sections, secondary highlights
accents.coralDescription: Active tags, progress indicators, selected chips, secondary actions
accents.tealDescription: Success states, secondary interactive elements, data visualization

borders.description: Subtle borders for inputs, cards, dividers

borderRadius.description: Extremely rounded corners are a dominant feature; use generously

shadows.description: Very subtle, diffused; avoid harsh shadows

nav.background: white with subtle border or canvas

stepIndicator.number: circle, accents.primary or peach bg, white text

layout.verticalStacking: Content blocks stacked vertically with sectionGap
layout.leftAligned: Dominant left alignment for text and modules

aiInstructions: When building or styling UI: (1) Use Poppins font. (2) Background #FFF9EC, text #0D253F. (3) Primary buttons/CTAs: #6488E4. (4) Selected states/tags: #E46472. (5) Warm highlights: #F9BE7C. (6) Success/teal: #309397. (7) Rounded corners (12-20px). (8) Subtle shadows. (9) Generous whitespace. (10) Clean, minimal, warm, professional.
